-- Use the variables: commandblock, power, powerPrev, direction, script to make your code
-- commandblock: The command block npc
-- power: The power level of the command block
-- powerPrev: The power level at the previous frame
-- direction: The direction the command block got powered. Left: 0, Up: 1, Right: 2, Down: 3
-- script: This script as a string
